title: Programming for Mechanical and Industrial Engineers
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: MATH 204 (Cegep mathematics 105).

title: Materials Science
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: CHEM 205 (Cegep Chemistry 101).

title: Manufacturing Processes
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: MECH 313 or MIAE 313.

title: Engineering Design and Manufacturing Processes Lab
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously or concurrently: MIAE 311.

title: Machine Drawing and Design
prereqCoreqText: The following course must be completed previously: MECH 211 or MIAE 211.

title: Product Design and Development
prereqCoreqText: The following courses must be completed previously: ENCS 282; MECH 211 or MIAE 211.
